title: Phantom dancer or ghostblade to replace statik shiv on gangplank
body:
Since statik shiv is no longer as good on gangplank as it used to be and you are only getting a measly  40% as 20% crit chance boost it seems like building phantom dancer is better than statik shiv if you want the sick crits or ghostblade for chasing and cdr allowing you to trade luciditys for mercs or ninja tabi.


Why is staik shiv no longer good?
-only applys on first kegs other kegs don't get the damage
-no need for its waveclear kegs are better
-damage falls off crits do not.
